captions.text: Here with Kai Lenny in two days I've learned what it means to be a real waterman. One of my biggest aims is going to Sunset Beach to do the SUP contest and do my best.
They say if you can surf at Hooki'pa you can surf everywhere.
I try a lot of moves with my board. Now I've started to try them also with SUP. For example, with aerials and also my bottom turns.
I'm getting ready, another adventure is starting!
Today Kai let me try his canoe for the first time
It's really strange that he is helping me and training me, because he will soon be my rival. It was really fun!
He explained to me how to row because it's really difficult. If you row in the wrong way you lose balance and the canoe capsizes.
Today Kai Lenny and his father brought me to a reef near their house.
It was really tough to get there but when we arrived, there was a perfect wave, a beautiful right where he often comes to train.
It was great we were in the middle of nowhere, just Kai and me and these beautiful waves. I really enjoyed it.
Here we are at Kai Lenny's house, a huge house with a big ramp outside.
Now, after a long day I'm here at Kai Lenny's for dinner, for some Hawaiian barbecue.
I tried to achieve my target with SUP and I finally got it training with Kai. Now I'm ready for Sunset!

title: SUP in Hawaii w/ Airton Cozzolino & Kai Lenny - Ep 3
